Entries.wizardNap: ถึง @,^^ข้าขออภัยอย่างจริงใจ ที่สภาพข้าที่เจ้าพบเมื่อวันก่อน บางครั้งข้าก็ทำงานจนลืมที่จะนอนครั้งละหลายวัน ถึงแม้จะเป็นข้า นั่นก็ยังทำลายสุขภาพยิ่งนัก...^นั่นจึงเป็นเหตุผลที่ข้าเขียนมา: เพื่อขอบคุณเจ้าอย่างจริงจังและจริงใจ สำหรับสิ่งที่เจ้าทำ ข้าไม่เคยมีคนมาสนใจว่าเป็นยังไงอย่างจริงจังมาก่อน ข้าพบว่ามันน่าตกใจ แต่ก็น่าอบอุ่นใจอย่างประหลาดเช่นกัน ถ้าข้าตอบแทนเจ้า ไม่ว่าทางไหนก็ตาม อย่าลังเลที่จะบอกข้าล่ะ^^อีกครั้ง @ ขอบคุณมาก แล้วพบกันเร็วๆ นี้^^ ด้วยความจริงใจ^ เอ็ม. ราสโมเดียส
Entries.teachMagic: ถึง @,^^ข้ารู้ว่ามันกระทันหันไปหน่อย แต่ข้าสงสัยว่า เจ้าจะมาเข้าร่วม ชั้นเรียนสอนเวทมนตร์ ทำนองนั้น กับข้าวันนี้ได้หรือไม่ มีคาถาที่ข้าเชื่อว่า เจ้าจะเสกได้แน่ ถ้าตั้งสมาธิดีๆ^แต่ถ้าเจ้ายุ่ง ข้าก็เข้าใจนะ แต่ถ้าไม่ มาเจอข้าที่ป่าลึกลับ ทางเหนือของกระท่อมข้านะ^^ ด้วยความจริงใจ^ เอ็ม. ราสโมเดียส

Entries.danceRejection: ไม่ล่ะ ขอบคุณ
Entries.Mon8: โอ้ ดีใจที่ได้เจอคุณนะ @!$h
Entries.Mon10: สวัสดี @! มัน... มันดีที่ได้เจอคุณนะ!$4
Entries.Tue10: โอ้... ดีที่คุณแวะมานะ @$h#$e#ไม่หรอก ผมไม่ได้ยุ่งอะไร... สัปดาห์นี้ไม่ค่อยมีอะไรน่ะ
Entries.Wed8: โอ้! เอ่อ... สวัสดี @ ผมไม่ได้ยินคุณเข้ามาน่ะ$4#$e#คุณว่าอากาศช่วงนี้ เป็นยังไงบ้าง...?
Entries.Wed10: ต้องการอัพเกรต เครื่องมือเหรอ?#$e#ไม่ใช่...? โอ้... คุณแค่แวะมาทักทายเหรอ?$4

Entries.Fri8: เอ่อ... สุดสัปดาห์นี้มีแผนอะไรมั้ย @?$4
Entries.Fri10: วันศุกร์แล้ว... เป็นเรื่องดีล่ะ!#$e#วันหยุดน่ะดีเสมอ...$h
Entries.Sat10: วันหยุดคุณก็แวะมาด้วย...$s#$e#ขอโทษนะ... ผมแค่ไม่เข้าใจน่ะว่าทำไม$4
Entries.Sun10: เอาล่ะ พรุ่งนี้ก็เป็นอีกสัปดาห์ที่ยุ่งอีกแล้ว#$e#โชคดีนะ @$h

Entries.event_blacksmith2: จริงๆ เหรอ? เยี่ยมเลย รอผมหยิบกระดาษออเดอร์ แปปนึงนะ...
Entries.event_sadclint1: อ-อ้อ ขอบคุณนะ @ นั่น... นั่นมีความหมายมากเลย$4
Entries.event_sadclint2: คุณก็ด้วยเหรอ?$s#$b#อ่า... บางทีเราคงเศร้าแล้วก็เหงาไปด้วยกันได้$h
Entries.event_iron1: อะ-เอ่อ ผมไม่ได้มาที่นี่บ่อยน่ะ...$s
Entries.event_iron2: เอ่อ ผม เอ่อ... ผมเพิ่งทำเสร็จ...$s#$b#ฟู่ว! หมดแรงเลย...$h
Entries.event_iron3: อะ-อะ-อะไรนะ? ทำไม... ทำไมจะไม่ล่ะ?$s

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Oh! Hi, honey. I'm working today, but I'll be home soon enough.
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Hi there, love. Need a tool upgrade?
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Thanks for visiting me at work, honey. It means a lot!

Entries.danceRejection: Ah, no. It's nice of you to ask though.
Entries.Mon8: Hi, @!#$e#It's always nice to see you here.
Entries.Mon10: Mondays are the closest thing I get to a day off as a bartender.#$e#So thanks for coming by to see me. It can get lonely.$h
Entries.Tue10: You work so hard, don't you, @?#$e#Sure, I work hard, too. But most of that is on the weekends.$h
Entries.Wed8: I wish I could open a full time diner here in Pelican Town.#$e#I like bartending well enough, but cooking is where my passion really lies.$5
Entries.Wed10: I wonder what it's like to work on a farm...$5#$e#I'm not sure how well I'd do. I'm not very physically fit.$s
Entries.Thu10: Emily's been bothering me to hurry up and get married already...$5#$e#Maybe I will.$h
Entries.Fri8: Sometimes I feel like I spend the entire week getting ready for Friday night.$5
Entries.Fri10: Not that I think about it much, but...#$e#Considering that I'm here at the saloon all the time, it's hard to think about asking anyone on a date.$5#$e#Where could we go on Friday night that isn't here?$s#$e#Why mention it, you ask?#$e#...Just a thought.$4
Entries.Sat10: If I do get married someday, you can be sure my husband will never go hungry.$h^If I do get married someday, you can be sure my wife will never go hungry.$h
Entries.Sun10: Hmm...$5#$e#Say, have you ever been in love, @?#$e#What does it feel like?$4
Entries.event_fruit1: Strawberries, eh? They are a delicious treat.$h
Entries.event_fruit2: Cherries, eh? Watch out for the pit.$h
Entries.event_fruit3: Is that so? Wonderful. I'm not sure I could pick myself!$h
Entries.divorced: I wish you wouldn't come here.$a

Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Oh, hello, dear. I'm getting the place ready for tonight.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Things are getting more lively. Why don't you stay awhile, honey?$h
Entries.marriage_Sat.000: Surprisingly, not so many people show up on Saturday. Mostly I just clean up last night's messes.
Entries.marriage_Sun.000: Today's a short day, honey. I'll be home soon!
Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey. I'm getting some supplies for the saloon.$h
Entries.marriage_Mon.001: This place isn't going to run itself. I'll see you tonight.

Entries.Mon_inlaw_Pam: Since you and Pam got together, I've seen her here a lot less.#$e#Normally I'd be down in the dumps at the loss of my best customer, but I'm glad she's happy.$h

Entries.danceRejection: I can't. I'm the one in charge of the event.
Entries.Mon8: Oh, @! Hello.#$e#Today would be a nice day for a picic, wouldn't you say?
Entries.Mon10: How have things been, @?#$e#I see you so often, yet I rarely remember to ask.$h
Entries.Tue10: Ah, if it isn't farmer @.#$e#Again.$h#$e#Do you have any business here?
Entries.Wed8: Nice to see you, @.#$e#We sure run into each other quite a lot, don't we?$h
Entries.Wed10: Is it just a coincidence that we always seem to meet here...?$s
Entries.Thu8: Ah... I'm not sure if you knew, but Marnie and I... we were sort of an item.#$e#We've separated.$s
Entries.Thu10: You look very nice today, Mr. @.$4^You look very nice today, Miss @.$4
Entries.Fri8: Some days being mayor feels very rewarding.#$e#Other days... well, I try not to think about those days.$s
Entries.Fri10: The whole town will be at the saloon tonight.#$e#I'll buy you a drink if you drop by.$4
Entries.Sat10: Last night sure was a doozy, eh?$h#$e#The saloon's always pretty crazy on Fridays.$h
Entries.Sun10: You're doing a great job, @.#$e#I'm very proud of the work you've done here in Pelican Town.$h#$e#And... I'm proud to call you my dear friend, too.$4
Entries.event_lewisBreakup1: I... I know. But I shouldn't have let myself get so close to y-- that person...$6
Entries.event_lewisBreakup2: ...Maybe a little.$4#$b#Still... no one deserves that.$s
Entries.event_lewisBreakup3: Um... it's... it's not important. Maybe I'll tell you later...$s
Entries.event_lewisMorning1: Oh, well it's nice to see you! Actually, it's strange you happened by...#$b#I was just thinking about how I wanted to speak to you.
Entries.event_lewisMorning2: Oh! Is that so?$4#$b#Well... actually, now that you're here, there's something I wanted to talk to you about.
Entries.event_lewisMorning3: Oh... could you spare just a moment? There's actually something I wanted to talk to you about.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie1: Oh... well, I'm sorry to hear that.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie2: Ah... so we've both experienced heartache from the same woman, eh?#$b#I'm sorry to hear that, @. Really.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie3: I-Is that so?$s#$b#Well... I'm glad to hear that.$a
Entries.event_loveMarnie4: I'm not sure Marnie felt the same way...$s
Entries.event_relocate1: Um, yes... We'll get it sorted out when we head down to the front desk.$s#$b#Well, let's get going, then.
Entries.event_relocate2: Certainly.#$b#For now we should head out! We can unpack this evening once we're back from the first round of meetings... And dinner, of course.$h
Entries.event_relocate3: O-oh. I suppose you're right... No need to cause the staff extra trouble on our account.$4#$b#Well... let's head out, shall we? We don't want to be late...$7
Entries.event_ruin1: I'm hungry, too. Let's get going, then. What are you in the mood for?
Entries.event_ruin2: Me too...$s#$b#Well, I know some decent bars here, at least. Let's go.
Entries.event_ruin3: Huh...? Am I okay...?$s#$b#I... I'm just a little taken aback by Lin's behavior.$s#$b#I'll be fine, though...#$b#@... Thank you for being here with me. Let's go get a good dinner.$h

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hello, dear. I'm here to check in with Pierre... and do some grocery shopping.$h
Entries.marriage_Mon.001: Robin's business is booming as usual.
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Oh, hi, dear! I'm here checking on Marnie's business.
Entries.marriage_Wed.001: Willy's shop sure is in a peaceful place.$h
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: I always like coming to check on the library. It's a nice, quiet place.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: I'm here to collect Clint's business tax.
Entries.marriage_Fri.002: I'm glad you're here, honey! Grab a drink and let's dance.$h

Entries.danceRejection: I'm... flattered, @. But it would cause too much of a scene. I'm sorry.$s
Entries.Mon8: @!$h#$e#It's nice to see you. Stay for a while.$h
Entries.Mon10: Hello, @.$h#$e#You should come over for dinner sometime.$7
Entries.Tue10: Living on a farm seems very sustainable.#$e#Not as sustainable as my tent, but...$h
Entries.Wed8: Tell me more about yourself, @.#$e#You're a very interesting person.$h
Entries.Wed10: I might be happy living on a farm someday...$6#$e#...Just a thought.$4
Entries.Thu8: I trust you, @. You're a good friend.$h
Entries.Thu10: You're very unique, @. I've never met someone quite like you before.$4
Entries.Fri8: You've shown me so much kindness, @.#$e#I can never fully repay it, but here is a token of my thanks. [226 212 228 202 728]
Entries.Fri10: What are you doing tonight, @?#$e#Come and visit me if you like.$h
Entries.Sat8: I said I was happy by myself before, but I'm glad you're my friend, @.$h
Entries.Sun8: I've been in Pelican Town for quite some time now.$6#$e#It might be time to leave soon...$s
Entries.Sun10: I'm thinking about moving my tent soon...$6#$e#Not far, don't you worry!$h#$e#I've always thought living near the beach would be wonderful.
Entries.summer_Mon10: I don't suppose a young one like yourself has ever been married...?#$e#Just curious.$4
Entries.summer_Fri10: Have you ever been in love, @?#$e#Love is a very beautiful thing. Cherish it if you are ever lucky enough to find it.$h
Entries.summer_Sat8: Have you done any fishing lately?#$e#Fishing is a great way to relax, and a wonderful opportunity to spend time with another person.$h
Entries.summer_Sun8: Fall is approaching...$s#$e#I'm thankful for the bounty from nature, but the cold weather makes it hard for me.
Entries.summer_Sun10: Summer is a great time to bathe in the river.#$e#Just make sure no one is around!$h
Entries.fall_Tue8: Winter is right around the corner. Make sure to stay warm, @.
Entries.fall_Wed8: When the weather gets colder I leave my tent less an less.$s
Entries.fall_Wed10: Hello, @. I hope you're prepared for the winter.#$e#It's supposed to be a rough one.$s
Entries.fall_Fri10: We should have a picnic sometime to celebrate the bounty Yoba gives us in the fall.#$e#Don't forget the fresh grape wine.$h
Entries.winter_Wed10: Yoba is very gracious, but...#$e#Sometimes I wonder what it would be like if I had someone to share warmth with these long winter nights.$s
Entries.winter_Fri8: Thankfully, I've yet to freeze to death in my tent.$h
Entries.winter_Sat10: My tent gets lonely sometimes. Feel free to stop by any time, @.$h
Entries.event_dinner1: I'm so glad you like it! I only use salt to season it - the trick is making sure the fish is freshly caught!$h
Entries.event_dinner2: Well... I'm not exactly a five-star chef... but I tried.$s
Entries.event_embarrassing1: I know that... but thank you, @. Sometimes I need a reminder myself.$h
Entries.event_embarrassing2: Really...? That means so much to me, @.$4
Entries.divorced: You have no reason to be here.$a

Entries.marriage_Wed.000: The mountain misses me. We were there for each other for many years.
Entries.marriage_Sat.000: The forest is a lovely place. I never explored it much when I lived in the mountains.
Entries.marriage_Sat.001: Fear not, my love. I'll be home soon enough.

Entries.danceRejection: Oh... I'm sorry, Mr. @... but no thank you.$s^Oh... I'm sorry, Ms. @... but no thank you.$s
Entries.Mon8: You take great care of your animals, @.#$e#Trust me... I just know!
Entries.Mon10: You... You're single, aren't you, @?$4#$e#Just curious!$4
Entries.Tue10: Thanks for visiting, @!#$e#It's always nice to see you.$4
Entries.Wed10: Hi, @! Are you here to see Shane?#$e#...Oh, me?$4
Entries.Fri8: Happy Friday, @! Any plans for the weekend?
Entries.Fri10: I'll be at the saloon tonight if you want to come see me.$h
Entries.event_marnieBreakup1: I... I know. But I shouldn't have let myself get so close to y-- that person...$8
Entries.event_marnieBreakup2: ...Maybe a little.$4#$b#Still... no one deserves that.$s
Entries.event_marnieBreakup3: Um... it's... it's not important. Maybe I'll tell you later...$s
Entries.event_marnieMorning1: Oh, well it's nice to see you! Actually, it's strange you happened by...#$b#I was just thinking about how I wanted to speak to you.
Entries.event_marnieMorning2: Oh! Is that so?$4#$b#Well... actually, now that you're here, there's something I wanted to talk to you about.
Entries.event_marnieMorning3: Oh... could you spare just a moment? There's actually something I wanted to talk to you about.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis1: Oh... well, I'm sorry to hear that.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis2: Ah... so we've both experienced heartache from the same man, huh?#$b#I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. @. Really.$s^I'm sorry to hear that, Ms. @. Really.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis3: I-Is that so?$s#$b#Well... I'm glad to hear that.$a
Entries.event_loveLewis4: I'm not sure Mr. Lewis felt the same way...$s
Entries.divorced: Oh... Do you have some business here...?$s

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey. Everything's going fine here at the shop... What a relief!
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: @! How nice of you visit. Don't worry! I'll be home at 5.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Oh, honey! Let's go to the saloon tonight! I get off at 5.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Wine is such a great way to relax after work.

Entries.danceRejection: You'd ask an old lady like me to dance? What do you take me for?$a
Entries.Mon8: I had Penny pretty young... I'm glad she turned out okay.$s
Entries.Tue8: Penny's father...?$s#$e#...It's a long story. We all do stupid things when we're young, right?$s
Entries.Wed10: Hey, @. Just here for a visit?$h
Entries.Thu8: I don't know why you waste your time talking to an old hag like me...$s
Entries.Fri10: You're really somethin', you know that, @?
Entries.Sat8: Penny never goes out to the saloon...#$e#I'm glad. A smart girl like her has better things to do than go out and drink like a fish every night.$s
Entries.Sat10: Hey. Glad you're here.$h#$e#Stay a while.
Entries.Sun10: Hey... come visit me tomorrow. Penny'll be out teachin' the kiddos.#$e#We can be all alone.$7

Entries.marriage_Sun.000: I figured I'd come say hi to Penny.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Hey, snookums. Figured I'd come give a nod to ol' Gus.
Entries.marriage_Tue.000: Hey, sweetie pie. Just doin' some shopping.
Entries.marriage_Tue.001: You need anything from here, sweetie?
Entries.marriage_Tue.002: Hey, wait up for me, sweetie. I'm almost done here.
Entries.marriage_Tue.003: Just gotta pay and I'll head home. See ya there, snookums.
Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hey, snookums. Need a ride to the desert?
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Hiya, sweetie pie. Another day of work... I'll be home before ya know it.

Entries.Mon4: Hey, @!$h#$e#How do you like it here in the desert?
Entries.Mon8: Hi there, sweetie. You sure come by a lot!$h
Entries.Tue2: Ah, it's such a peaceful day today...$h
Entries.Tue6: How's your week going, sweetie?#$e#Tell me about it.
Entries.Wed4: Bring me something from your farm sometime, @! I know how successful you are.$h
Entries.Wed8: Isn't it expensive, coming to the desert so often like you do?#$e#You must really like to see me, huh? Hmmm... $h
Entries.Thu8: I bet you wish you knew my real name, huh?$h
Entries.Fri6: Happy Friday, @!$h#$e#Oh... Farmers don't get much of a weekend, do they?$3
Entries.Fri10: Ah, @. You're looking handsome today.^Ah, @. You're looking lovely today.
Entries.Sat2: @! Lovely to see you! How's life in the valley?
Entries.Sat6: Oh, hello, sweetie!$h#$e#The weekends are always so slow... It's nice to see a familiar face!
Entries.Sat8: It's Saturday... You'd better get going! I'm sure a handsome man like you has a date tonight!^It's Saturday... You'd better get going! I'm sure a lovely lady like you has a date tonight!
Entries.Sat10: Say, honey, ever thought about moving to the desert? It's a nice place.$h
Entries.Sun4: Have you seen Emily lately?#$e#We've known each other for quite some time.$h#$e#She actually designed my outfit!
Entries.Sun10: You've been working hard, haven't you?#$e#I can tell.$7

Entries.danceRejection: No, skipper. This body is for fishin', not for dancin'.
Entries.Mon8: I just finished cookin' up yesterday's catch.#$e#Here, have some! Tell me what y'think. [198 209 214 219]
Entries.Mon10: Let's go off on a fishing trip sometime, @.#$e#I'll show you some o' my secrets.$h
Entries.Tue10: My little ol' cottage gets lonely sometimes.#$e#It's nice when you visit, skipper.$4
Entries.Wed8: I heard there's a mutant fish you can catch in the sewers.#$e#Too bad they're all locked up.$h
Entries.Wed10: Even if you hated fishing, I'd still want you as a friend, skipper.$h
Entries.Thu10: I smell a storm brewing...#$e#If you ever get stuck in the rain, you can wait it out in my cottage.$h
Entries.Fri8: Sometimes I stop by the saloon on Friday nights.#$e#I don't drink much, but it gets a little too quiet in the shop during the week.
Entries.Fri10: You look pretty strong... It must be all the farm work.$4#$e#I bet you can cast a fishing line for miles.$4
Entries.Sat10: Do y'think an old sailor like me'll ever find love?$4
Entries.Sun7: Rainy days are best for fishin' trips.#$b#Let's go sometime, eh, skipper?$h

Entries.marriage_Tue.000: Ahoy, my little angelfish. Whaddaya need?$h
Entries.marriage_Thu.000: I'll be home early today, angelfish. Don't miss me too much.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: I'll be headin' to the saloon when I'm done here, skipper. You should come along.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Ah, what a great way to relax. I'm glad you're here, skipper.$h

Entries.Mon2: I suppose you're beginning to get to know the residents of this town.#$e#Funny that you seem to think that includes me.$s
Entries.Mon6: Don't you have anything better to do than come interrupt my research?
Entries.Mon10: Ah, the beginning of a new week. Let's hope it's a successful one.$7
Entries.Tue8: If I'm perfectly honest, I don't mind living here.#$e#It's a quiet, peaceful place with an excess of magical energy for harvesting.
Entries.Tue10: Ah, @. I'm glad you're here.#$e#I found this in the forest yesterday. I thought perhaps you could use it. [404 709 280]
Entries.Wed6: Have you ever thought about studying magic, @?#$e#I'm only curious. I'm not sure you could do it anyway.
Entries.Thu4: Ah, @. Bring you any interesting news?
Entries.Thu8: I don't suppose you have a reason you're here so often...$s
Entries.Fri2: I ask you to kindly leave me be. I have much work to do. It is nothing personal.
Entries.Fri4: The air smells like magic today. It's pleasant.$9
Entries.Fri10: You are a very curious person, @.#$e#I've never met someone quite like you in my many years.
Entries.Sat4: You've already gained access to my basement. What else could you possibly want from me?$s
Entries.Sat8: The valley is truly a wonderful place to study magic.$9
Entries.Sat10: You visit so often these days... Is there a reason?$3
Entries.Sun4: I have no need for mortal friends, I assure you.#$e#I suppose I appreciate the thought.
Entries.Sun8: I sincerely hope you succeed in your pursuits, @.
Entries.Sun10: I'm... glad to call you a friend, @. You're not like the other villagers.$4
